action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

set -ex

git clone --quiet https://github.com/pipoe2h/ansible-nutanix.git
cat <<EOF > karbon_k8s_cluster.yml
---
pe_cluster_name: @@{PE_CLUSTER_NAME}@@
pe_storagecontainer_name: @@{PE_STORAGECONTAINER_NAME}@@
pe_network_name: @@{PE_NETWORK_NAME}@@

karbon_k8s_cluster_name: @@{KARBON_K8S_CLUSTER_NAME}@@
karbon_k8s_cluster_description: @@{KARBON_K8S_CLUSTER_DESCRIPTION}@@
karbon_k8s_template_name: @@{KARBON_K8S_TEMPLATE_NAME}@@ # acs-centos or acs-ubuntu
karbon_k8s_version: @@{KARBON_K8S_VERSION}@@ # v1.8.13, v1.9.6 or v1.10.3
karbon_k8s_service_cidr: @@{KARBON_K8S_SERVICE_CIDR}@@ # 172.19.0.0/16
karbon_k8s_pod_cidr: @@{KARBON_K8S_POD_CIDR}@@ # 172.20.0.0/16
karbon_k8s_api_fqdn: @@{KARBON_K8S_API_FQDN}@@ # ''

karbon_etcd_instances: @@{KARBON_ETCD_INSTANCES}@@ # 1, 3 or 5
karbon_etcd_cpu: @@{KARBON_ETCD_CPU}@@ # Minimum 2
karbon_etcd_memory: @@{KARBON_ETCD_MEMORY}@@ # Minimum 8192
karbon_etcd_disk: @@{KARBON_ETCD_DISK}@@ # Recommended 40960

karbon_master_cpu: @@{KARBON_MASTER_CPU}@@ # Minimum 2
karbon_master_memory: @@{KARBON_MASTER_MEMORY}@@ # Minimum 4096
karbon_master_disk: @@{KARBON_MASTER_DISK}@@ # Recommended 122880

karbon_worker_instances: @@{KARBON_WORKER_INSTANCES}@@ # 1 or more
karbon_worker_cpu: @@{KARBON_WORKER_CPU}@@ # Minimum 2
karbon_worker_memory: @@{KARBON_WORKER_MEMORY}@@ # Minimum 4096
karbon_worker_disk: @@{KARBON_WORKER_DISK}@@ # Recommended 122880
EOF

cat <<EOF > inventory
@@{PC_ADDRESS}@@
EOF

cd ansible-nutanix && ansible-playbook -i ../inventory -e @../karbon_k8s_cluster.yml \
-e "pc_username=@@{PC_USERNAME}@@ pc_password=@@{PC_PASSWORD}@@" \
roles/pipoe2h.ntnx_karbon-create_cluster/playbook.yml

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

curl -LO https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/$(curl -s https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/stable.txt)/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl
chmod +x ./kubectl
sudo mv ./kubectl /usr/local/bin/kubectl

#!/bin/bash

set -ex

mkdir -p k8s-addons/epoch
cd k8s-addons/epoch

echo '---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  name: epoch
---
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  namespace: epoch
  name: collector
  labels:
    app: epoch
    component: collector
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: epoch
        component: collector
    spec:
      hostNetwork: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirstWithHostNet
      containers:
      - name: collector
        image: gcr.io/nutanix-epoch/collectors:latest
        command: ["/bin/bash","-c","while true ; do EPOCH_AOC_HOST=$EPOCH_SERVICE_HOST /opt/nutanix/epoch/collectors/start.sh ; echo Exiting, possibly to upgrade ; sleep 5 ; done"]
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
        env:
        # Please DO NOT prepend http:// or https:// to the EPOCH_SERVICE_HOST value
        - name: EPOCH_SERVICE_HOST
          value: @@{epoch_service_host}@@
        - name: EPOCH_ORGANIZATION_ID
          value: @@{epoch_org_id}@@
        - name: EPOCH_ANALYSIS_DEPTH
          value: "layer4"
        - name: EPOCH_INTERFACE
          value: "any"
        - name: DEPLOY_ENV
          value: "docker"
        - name: KUBERNETES
          value: "yes"
        - name: SD_BACKEND
          value: "docker"
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: "512Mi"
            cpu: "1000m"
          limits:
            memory: "1Gi"
            cpu: "2000m"
        volumeMounts:
        - name: cgroup
          mountPath: /host/sys/fs/cgroup/
          readOnly: true
        - name: proc
          mountPath: /host/proc/
          readOnly: true
        - name: docker-sock
          mountPath: /var/run/docker.sock
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: cgroup
        hostPath:
          path: /sys/fs/cgroup/
      - name: proc
        hostPath:
          path: /proc/
      - name: docker-sock
        hostPath:
          path: /var/run/docker.sock' | tee epoch.yaml

kubectl create -f epoch.yaml

#!/bin/bash

set -ex

sudo yum install -y git

mkdir -p k8s-addons/helm
cd k8s-addons/helm

curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/helm/helm/master/scripts/get > get_helm.sh
chmod 700 get_helm.sh
./get_helm.sh

helm init --client-only
helm plugin install https://github.com/rimusz/helm-tiller

#!/bin/bash

set -ex

mkdir -p k8s-addons/metallb
cd k8s-addons/metallb

helm tiller start-ci
export HELM_HOST=localhost:44134

helm install --name metallb --set rbac.create=false stable/metallb --namespace metallb-system

helm tiller stop

echo '---
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  namespace: metallb-system
  name: metallb-config
data:
  config: |
    address-pools:
    - name: my-ip-space
      protocol: layer2
      addresses:
      - @@{METALLB_RANGE}@@' | tee layer2-config.yaml

kubectl create -f layer2-config.yaml

#!/bin/bash

set -ex

#mkdir -p k8s-addons
#cd k8s-addons
#git clone https://github.com/kubernetes/heapster.git
#cd heapster/deploy/kube-config/influxdb
#kubectl create -f influxdb.yaml
#sed -i "s/kubernetes:https:\/\/kubernetes.default/kubernetes.summary_api:''/g" heapster.yaml
#kubectl create -f heapster.yaml

helm tiller start-ci
export HELM_HOST=localhost:44134

helm install --name heapster --namespace kube-system stable/heapster 

helm tiller stop

#!/bin/bash

set -ex

helm tiller start-ci
export HELM_HOST=localhost:44134

helm install --name kubernetes-dashboard stable/kubernetes-dashboard --set service.type=LoadBalancer --namespace kube-system

helm tiller stop

#!/bin/bash

set -ex

mkdir -p k8s-addons/prometheus_grafana
cd k8s-addons/prometheus_grafana

helm tiller start-ci
export HELM_HOST=localhost:44134

helm repo add coreos https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/coreos-charts/stable/
helm install coreos/prometheus-operator --name prometheus-operator --namespace monitoring
helm install coreos/kube-prometheus --name kube-prometheus --namespace monitoring

helm tiller stop

echo '---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: grafana-svc
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  ports:
  - name: web
    port: 3000
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: web
  selector:
    app: kube-prometheus-grafana' | tee grafana-svc.yaml

kubectl create -f grafana-svc.yaml

    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo yum update -y --quiet
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@
sudo yum install -y --quiet git
#Install Ntp
sudo yum install -y --quiet ntp
sudo ntpdate @@{NTP_SERVER}@@
#Install Ansible
sudo yum install -y --quiet epel-release
sudo yum install -y --quiet python-pip ansible
sudo pip install jinja2 --upgrade -q

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

#!/bin/bash

set -ex

mkdir -p k8s-addons/epoch
cd k8s-addons/epoch

echo '---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  name: epoch
---
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  namespace: epoch
  name: collector
  labels:
    app: epoch
    component: collector
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: epoch
        component: collector
    spec:
      hostNetwork: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirstWithHostNet
      containers:
      - name: collector
        image: gcr.io/nutanix-epoch/collectors:latest
        command: ["/bin/bash","-c","while true ; do EPOCH_AOC_HOST=$EPOCH_SERVICE_HOST /opt/nutanix/epoch/collectors/start.sh ; echo Exiting, possibly to upgrade ; sleep 5 ; done"]

            add:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
        env:
        # Please DO NOT prepend http:// or https:// to the EPOCH_SERVICE_HOST value
        - name: EPOCH_SERVICE_HOST
          value: @@{epoch_service_host}@@
        - name: EPOCH_ORGANIZATION_ID
          value: @@{epoch_org_id}@@
        - name: EPOCH_ANALYSIS_DEPTH
          value: "layer4"
        - name: EPOCH_INTERFACE
          value: "any"
        - name: DEPLOY_ENV
          value: "docker"
        - name: KUBERNETES
          value: "yes"
        - name: SD_BACKEND
          value: "docker"
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: "512Mi"
            cpu: "1000m"
          limits:
            memory: "1Gi"
            cpu: "2000m"
        volumeMounts:
        - name: cgroup
          mountPath: /host/sys/fs/cgroup/
          readOnly: true
        - name: proc
          mountPath: /host/proc/
          readOnly: true
        - name: docker-sock
          mountPath: /var/run/docker.sock
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: cgroup
        hostPath:
          path: /sys/fs/cgroup/
      - name: proc
        hostPath:
          path: /proc/
      - name: docker-sock
        hostPath:
          path: /var/run/docker.sock' | tee epoch.yaml

kubectl create -f epoch.yaml

set -ex

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@
sudo yum install -y --quiet git
#Install Ntp

sudo ntpdate @@{NTP_SERVER}@@
#Install Ansible
